1.title: Goldilocks and the Four Movers
1.plot: The Movers must help Goldilocks fix her friendship with the three bears. After they Brainstorm, Nina enters and suggests that Goldilocks and the Movers invite the bears to a picnic.

2.title: The Idea Cafe
2.plot: The Movers discover Bernie's Cafe has been packed into boxes because Bernie's retiring! While reminiscing about the good food and times they had at Bernie's, the movers decide they need to find a way to replace all the things they love about the cafe!

3.title: One Cool Mover
3.plot: A cool biker named Clutch rumbles into the Idea CafZ and the Movers have to help him get rid of the squeak in his motorcycle.

4.title: Wishful Thinking
4.plot: A Genie named Al appears while Scott is cleaning an old brass oil lamp that he plans to give to Nina for her birthday. The Genie tells Scott he has three wishes, but when Scott tries to make a wish, Al discovers his wish granting power is out of wack.

5.title: Slam Dunk Solution
5.plot: The Movers install a basketball hoop in the Idea Warehouse and all the Movers can't wait to play basketball, except for Smitty, who makes up an excuse that he can't play because he has to water his plants.

7.title: The Frog Prince
7.plot: The Movers must break the spell of an Evil Queen to turn a Prince named Jeremiah back into a frog.

8.title: Fathers Know Best
8.plot: The Movers plan a Father's Day barbeque for their dads.

9.title: Castaways
9.plot: When the Movers go looking for Hawaiian flowers, shells and fresh fruit for Hawaiian Day, they get stuck on a deserted island.

11.title: Snorey Morrie
11.plot: Dave's uncle's snoring keeps the Movers from getting things done.

12.title: Walkaway Walkie
12.plot: The Movers have to find Dave's missing walkie talkie.

14.title: Nina's Day Off
14.plot: The Movers help Nina take a break.

15.title: Say Cheese
15.plot: The Movers help a farmer to get his goat to give milk.

16.title: How the West Was Fun
16.plot: The Movers help a cowboy cross a canyon.

17.title: Mouse Scouts Clip Show
17.plot: Warehouse Mouse is training to be a Mouse Scout, but at the last moment he gets cold feet.

19.title: Shall We Dance
19.plot: Boris and Oksana, famous ballet dancers, have a slippery problem for the Movers to solve.

20.title: Aloha Nina
20.plot: The Movers panic when they overhear Nina's moving to Hawaii.

22.title: Scott and the Beanstalk
22.plot: The Movers need to find a way to rescue Scott's teddy bear from a Giant at the top of a beanstalk.

1.title: No Noise Is Good Noise
1.plot: The Movers try to find the source of a strange noise so that they can record the song they made for Nina.

2.title: The Tooth Hurts
2.plot: Warehouse Mouse has a cavity because he does not brush correctly and he is afraid to go to the vet to have it fixed.

3.title: Bad Hair Day
3.plot: Scott's hair is a disaster, and the Movers try to fix it so that Nina can take their picture for the newspaper.

4.title: A Puppy Problem
4.plot: A lost puppy shows up at the warehouse door. But when the Movers finally figure out whom he belongs to, the puppy disappears in the warehouse.

5.title: Body Language
5.plot: A strange new customer arrives at the warehouse speaking a foreign language, but the Movers can't figure out what he's trying to say.

6.title: Super Goop
6.plot: Rich and Smitty are stuck to each other by Dave's "super goop," and nobody can figure out how to get them free.

7.title: Heavy Reading
7.plot: The Movers come to the aid of a saleswoman whose World Phone Book is too big and bulky.

8.title: It's a Breeze
8.plot: The Movers struggle to close the door to the Wind Room so that everything in the warehouse won't blow away.

9.title: A Bee Story
9.plot: "Robo-Bee" is flying out of control in the warehouse, and the Movers and Nina can't figure out how to catch him.

10.title: The Un-Party
10.plot: The Movers try to help Nina throw a birthday party for Knit-Knots, but he doesn't want cake, piñatas, or happy music.

11.title: Too Cool
11.plot: The movers try to figure out why it's so cold in the warehouse.

12.title: Sneeze and Thank You
12.plot: The Movers try to figure out what's causing Dave to sneeze so that he can fix the voicemail machine.

13.title: Bucket Trouble
13.plot: The Movers can't shoot their commercial because Rich has a bucket stuck on his foot.

14.title: Finders Key-pers
14.plot: Knit Knots loses his key, and the Movers and Nina help him try to find it.

15.title: Wayne Dance
15.plot: A singer comes to the Movers for help learning how to dance before a big show.

16.title: Hiccups
16.plot: The Movers help Knit Knots get rid of his hiccups so that he can record his stories.

17.title: All Broken Up
17.plot: The Movers break Nina's cuckoo clock and try to fix it.

18.title: Big Pumpkin Problem
18.plot: The Movers want to enter their pumpkin in a biggest pumpkin contest, but it's so big that they can't get it out the door.

19.title: Have a Ball
19.plot: A star football player asks the Movers for help catching a ball so that he can make the team.

20.title: Knit Knots Gets Stuck
20.plot: Knit Knots gets stuck in Dave's new jumpsuit, and the Movers try to get him out of it so that he can go to his Boring Club meeting.

21.title: Present Problem
21.plot: Nina brings over her holiday gifts for the Movers, but there's a problem - none of the gifts are labeled. Now the Movers must use their creativity to deduce each gift's recipient without opening them and ruining the surprise.

22.title: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Mouse
22.plot: The Movers bring in a repairman to fix the TV, but he can't do the job because he's afraid of Warehouse Mouse.

23.title: March of the Movers
23.plot: The Movers help a customer play trombone and march at the same time so that she can join her school band.

24.title: Treasure of the Warehouse
24.plot: The Movers help famous treasure hunter Brick Ford search for his grandpappy's treasure, which is located somewhere in the warehouse.

25.title: Mother's Day Gift
25.plot: The Movers must help Nina - Mother's Day is only two days away, and Nina still doesn't know what to get her mom!

26.title: Rockabye Rich
26.plot: The rest of the movers try to help Rich get to sleep.

1.title: Captain Terrific
1.plot: Superhero Captain Terrific can no longer fly, so he turns to the Movers for help.

2.title: It's a Mystery
2.plot: The Movers try to find out who's been stealing all their food.

3.title: Mousesitting
3.plot: Warehouse Mouse is babysitting his nephew Gouda, but he won't stop crying.

4.title: Slip Slidin' Away
4.plot: The floors of the warehouse are too waxy, but the Movers and Nina can't get to the Squeaky Clean room to get wax remover because it's too slippery.

5.title: Second Chance Pants
5.plot: The Movers and Nina help bicycle racing star Pants Armstrong overcome his fear of crashing so that he can compete again.

6.title: A Monster Problem
6.plot: A friendly monster comes to the Movers on Halloween for help in becoming less scary so that he can make friends.

7.title: A Fairy Tale Ending
7.plot: Cinderella comes to the Movers after the ball, and they try to help her hook up with the prince so they can live happily ever after.

8.title: Mouse and Home
8.plot: The Movers try to find a new home for Warehouse Mouse because his fancy new bed won't fit in his old one.

9.title: Happy Ha-Ha Holidays
9.plot: Santa Claus is supposed to be appearing at the mall up the street but his 'Ho-Ho-Ho' is not sounding right. Instead, Santa lets out a tiny, high-pitched 'he-he-he.' With a laugh like that he'll disappoint all the children.

10.title: Snow Day
10.plot: The Movers have to remove all the snow that covers their door so that Nina can go out and take pictures for the newspaper.

11.title: Muffin Man
11.plot: The Movers try to help Baker Ben remember the secret ingredient for his perfect muffins.

12.title: Farmhouse Mouse
12.plot: Warehouse Mouse's cousin, Farmhouse Mouse, comes to visit for his vacation, but he and Warehouse can't agree on anything.

13.title: Tooth Fairy
13.plot: A fill-in tooth fairy has to learn how to fill-in for the job. She's new and just started the night before, and is upset because all the kids that she went to retrieve teeth from woke up and she never had a chance to take the teeth or leave money.

14.title: Ace Mulligan
14.plot: Golfer Ace Mulligan has lost his lucky hat and can no longer make any putts, so he asks the Movers for help.

15.title: Out of Tunes
15.plot: Blues musician T-Bone Crosby turns to the Movers for help because he can't come up with new ideas for songs.

16.title: Power Play
16.plot: The Movers need more electricity so that they can record a CD for Nina's party.

17.title: Bye Bye Butterfly
17.plot: The Movers help a butterfly collector catch a butterfly in the warehouse that she needs for her new museum exhibit.

18.title: Birthdayball
18.plot: A star baseball player needs help deciding whether to play in the big game or go to his son's birthday party.

19.title: Trouble in Paradise
19.plot: Nina tries to find something Hawaiian she can do when she goes to Hawai'i for her grandmothers birthday party.

20.title: Give Me Strength
20.plot: "Gunther the Great," the strongman in a touring circus, comes to seek help from The Imagination Movers to figure out why he can't lift the heavy weight in his show anymore.

21.title: Nina Gets the Giggles
21.plot: The Movers help Nina stop giggling every time she plays the harp.

22.title: Knight Time
22.plot: Sir Fearsalot is charged with rescuing the Princess of his kingdom, who is being held by an evil Queen. To get there he must journey through the Scary Dark Forest. The Movers must find ways to help him not be afraid and save the princess!

23.title: The Tale of Captain Kiddo
23.plot: The Movers help Captain Kiddo the Twelfth learn a pirate skill before his ship departs the next day.

24.title: Mouse Day
24.plot: While celebrating "Bright Idea Day," a holiday celebrated every year by great thinkers all around the globe, Warehouse Mouse wishes he had a holiday. Mouse creates the holiday "Mouse Day" and the Movers help him think up ideas of ways to celebrate.

25.title: Seeing Stars
25.plot: The Movers help a famous director find a male actor to play the lead role in his next movie.

-1.title: Award to the Wise
-1.plot: The Movers help Dave find something for which he can win a trophy.

imdb.title: Imagination Movers
plot: Four Best Friends who solve problems for others.
